det_sum_smul_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem det_sum_smul_le {ι : Type _} (s : Finset ι) {c : ι → R} {A : ι → matrix n n R} {abv : AbsoluteValue R S} {x : S}
    (hx : ∀ k i j, abv (A k i j) ≤ x) {y : S} (hy : ∀ k, abv (c k) ≤ y) :
    abv
        (det
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s
            («expr • » (c k) (A k)))) ≤
      «expr • » (Nat.factorial (fintype.card n)) ((«expr • » (finset.card s) y * x) ^ fintype.card n) :=
  by
  simpa only [smul_mul_assoc] using
    det_sum_le s fun k i j =>
      calc
        abv (c k * A k i j) = abv (c k) * abv (A k i j) := abv.map_mul _ _
        _ ≤ y * x := mul_le_mul (hy k) (hx k i j) (abv.nonneg _) ((abv.nonneg _).trans (hy k))
        
#align det_sum_smul_le det_sum_smul_le
det_sum_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem det_sum_le {ι : Type _} (s : Finset ι) {A : ι → matrix n n R} {abv : AbsoluteValue R S} {x : S}
    (hx : ∀ k i j, abv (A k i j) ≤ x) :
    abv
        (det
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (A k))) ≤
      «expr • » (Nat.factorial (fintype.card n)) («expr • » (finset.card s) x ^ fintype.card n) :=
  det_le fun i j =>
    calc
      abv
            ((finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (A k)) i
              j) =
          abv
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s
              (A k i j)) :=
        by simp only [sum_apply]
      _ ≤
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s
            (abv (A k i j)) :=
        abv.sum_le _ _
      _ ≤ finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s x :=
        sum_le_sum fun k _ => hx k i j
      _ = «expr • » s.card x := sum_const _
      
#align det_sum_le det_sum_le
det_le:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.prod_univ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod_univ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/

/-

theorem det_le {A : matrix n n R} {abv : AbsoluteValue R S} {x : S} (hx : ∀ i j, abv (A i j) ≤ x) :
    abv A.det ≤ «expr • » (Nat.factorial (fintype.card n)) (x ^ fintype.card n) :=
  calc
    abv A.det =
        abv
          (finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
            _) :=
      congr_arg abv (det_apply _)
    _ ≤
        finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
          (abv _) :=
      abv.sum_le _ _
    _ =
        finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
          (finset.prod_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod_univ"
            (abv (A (σ i) i))) :=
      sum_congr rfl fun σ hσ => by rw [abv.map_units_int_smul, abv.map_prod]
    _ ≤
        finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
          (finset.prod_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod_univ"
            x) :=
      sum_le_sum fun _ _ => prod_le_prod (fun _ _ => abv.nonneg _) fun _ _ => hx _ _
    _ =
        finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
          (x ^ fintype.card n) :=
      sum_congr rfl fun _ _ => by rw [prod_const, finset.card_univ]
    _ = «expr • » (Nat.factorial (fintype.card n)) (x ^ fintype.card n) := by
      rw [sum_const, finset.card_univ, fintype.card_perm]
    
#align det_le det_le
